ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon choice
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve told people once, and I ll tell em again....Get your piercing up and find a Dragoon Dirk. You won t be sorry... Lulen ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I've told people once, and I'll tell 'em again....Get your piercing up and
find a Dragoon Dirk. You won't be sorry...

Lulen

----- Original Message -----
From: <chlebek@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 16:05
Subject: [eqbards] Weapon choice


> From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>
> I am in need of a new weapon to replace my aging combine longsword and 2
choices
> that come to mind are a Barbed Whip or a Polished Granite Tomahawk. Both
of
> these weapons have plusses and minusses and I was wondering if anyone here
had
> an opinion of which, if either, is better and why. Or if you know of any
other
> weapons that can be bought (I hate camping) for around 100-200pp feel free
to
> expound on their virtues as well.
>
> Thanks,
> Taelin, Songweavers of Kelethin
>
> P.S. A piercing weapon would work too. I already use a Dragoon Dirk as my
> secondary weapon.
>
>
>
